entry.title: niteshpal-25/TodoApp-Frontend: Todo App is a simple, efficient, and lightweight task management application built using the FastAPI framework. It allows users to create, read, update, and delete tasks in a to-do list, making it easy to manage daily tasks or project to-do items.

entry.title: AkshayPanchivala/slack-notify-kit: Slack Notify Kit is a lightweight Node.js utility that helps developers send beautifully formatted Slack messages using incoming webhooks. It supports HTML-to-text conversion, code block formatting, message types (info, warning, error), and optional channel overrides. Great for logging, error reporting, and automated alerts in your apps.
entry.content: Slack Notify Kit is a lightweight Node.js utility that helps developers send beautifully formatted Slack messages using incoming webhooks. It supports HTML-to-text conversion, code block formatting, message types (info, warning, error), and optional channel overrides. Great for logging, error reporting, and automated alerts in your apps.
